channel.title: I cant run a server on me new laptop
channel.description:
hi i got a new laptop with windows 7
but if i try to run a server i get the normal black box, but it says like; java not reconized bla bla bla, please help!

item.title: I cant run a server on me new laptop
item.dc:creator: @iCreatedHorror Ryan
item.description:
@iCreatedHorror wrote:

Go use the search bar, Lin’s tutorial with the download for the Enviromental Variables setter is perfect…exactly what I used when I got my windows 7 also.
I searched and found THIS!
Just use that, does the setting for you…

CoonHunter:

Please use google on setting environment variables. There are countless amount of tutorials for that.

He doesn’t understand searching, he’s probably to lazy…

Read full topic

item.title: I cant run a server on me new laptop
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

Have you installed java? That is typically why that error would be given. If you have, then you need to set your environment variables.

Read full topic
item.source: I cant run a server on me new laptop

item.title: I cant run a server on me new laptop
item.dc:creator: @iCreatedHorror Ryan
item.description:
@iCreatedHorror wrote:

Download Java, set your enviromental variables, and make sure the path in the run.bat matches your PATH in enviromental variables…and try the search bar next time.

Read full topic
